issues.description: The template repository defines addGuestStudents with two parameters (int numberOfNewGuestStudents, boolean validateInput), but the problem statement and UML specify a single-parameter method addGuestStudents(int). The reference solution also implements the one-parameter version. This mismatch will cause compilation errors against the expected tests and confuse students about the correct signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the templateâ€™s addGuestStudents method signature to match the specification and solution by removing the boolean parameter, e.g.: public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents).
